<[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> Spring, Cloud Foundry and Microservices
2015 was the year of microservices. Many of us get the basics now and are graduating to harder problems. Learn about both <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/schedule/sessions]]> directly from leading industry and Pivotal committers working with Spring, Cloud Foundry, NetflixOSS, Hashicorp, Apache, Zipkin, and more. Network with top industry developers, operators, architects, product managers, data scientists, and executives as we gather for in-depth conversations on the impact of transformative software at SpringOne Platform 2016. Save $150.00 by registering now <[[https://2016.event.springoneplatform.io/register]]> and don’t forget to book your hotel at the best tech hotel in Vegas! <[[https://aws.passkey.com/event/14801722/owner/1464789/home]]>!
Pre-conference training July 31—Aug 1st
Pivotal Education offers a series of accelerated, hands-on training workshops prior to the SpringOne conference. Training ticket prices increase on June 11, so register now for these in-depth trainings on the latest Pivotal and Spring technologies and save. Check out the new Spring Cloud Data Flow training!
